# RelevantContext.InferredLocation

**Structure**

A structure with values for a person’s inferred home, work, school, and commute locations.

## Declaration

```swift
struct InferredLocation
```

## Conditions

- **commute**: A person’s commute between two inferred locations.
- **home**: A person’s inferred home location.
- **school**: A person’s inferred school location.
- **work**: A person’s inferred work location.

## Location clues

- **location(_:)**: Tells the system a widget is relevant at a specific location.
- **location(inferred:)**: Tells the system a widget is relevant at a person’s inferred location.

items.description: A person’s commute between two inferred locations.
items.name: commute

items.description: Tells the system a widget is relevant at a specific location.
items.name: location(_:)

items.description: Tells the system a widget is relevant at a person’s inferred location.
items.name: location(inferred:)
